description: The EU aims to start reopening external borders on 1 July, but US travellers may have to wait.
title: Coronavirus: EU considers barring Americans from travel list
title_page: Coronavirus: EU considers barring Americans from travel list - BBC News
maintext: Reports said member states were assessing two different lists. The Politico website said one covered countries with fewer than 16 cases per 100,000 people and the other with up to 20 cases, which would include Canada and Turkey. The New York Times said the list would be revised every two weeks, so the US could be added later.
